title: #Drive.v1_1_0.Drive

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CryptoErase.description: This action is used to cryptographically erase a self-encrypting drive (SED) which supports Instant Secure Erase (ISE).
CryptoErase.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported on this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Members.description: A set of drives that form a volume.

FreeSpaceMiBPerDrive:.description: Total free space of each drive of the volume.

TotalFreeSpaceMiB:.description: Total free space of the volume.

FreeBlocksSpaceMiB:.description: Capacity of each free block of the volume.

NumDrivePerSpan.description: Number of physical drives in a span of the volume.

RelatedArray.description: Information about the volume to which the drives belong.
RelatedArray.longDescription: The volume information includes the drive members, available capacity, number of drives in a span, and RAID level.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SecureErase.description: This action is used to securely erase the contents of the drive.
SecureErase.longDescription: This defines the name of the custom action supported on this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RawValue.description: RAW value of the attribute before conversion.
RawValue.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the RAW value of the attribute before conversion.

UpdateMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall be SMART attributes of the SATA interface.The value of this property shall be SMART attributes of the SATA interface.

AttributeName.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the name of a SMART attribute, which is a test item.

NormalizedValue.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the result of calculating the raw value through a formula. The value ranges from 1 to 253. 253 indicates the best result. 1 indicates the worst result. The calculation formula is provided by the hard disk supplier.

Flag.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the flag of an operation. The values are K (automatic retaining), C (event statistics), R (error rate), S (speed/performance), O (online update), and P (fault warning).

WorstValue.description: Smallest value of the different items during hard disk running.
WorstValue.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the worst value, which is the smallest value of all normalized values since SMART is enabled.

Threshold.longDescription: If a normalized value is smaller than or equal to the threshold, the test item has failed.

FaultWarningMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the fault warning mode. The values are the Pre-failed mode or Old-age mode.

enumDescriptions.None: The drive is not capable of self encryption
enumDescriptions.SelfEncryptingDrive: The drive is capable of self encryption per the Trusted Computing Group's Self Encrypting Drive Standard
enumDescriptions.Other: The drive is capable of self encryption through some other means

enumDescriptions.Unecrypted: The drive is not currently encrypted. Deprecated: Use Unencrypted
enumDescriptions.Unlocked: The drive is currently encrypted but the data is accessible to the user unencrypted
enumDescriptions.Locked: The drive is currently encrypted and the data is not accessible to the user, however the system has the ability to unlock the drive automatically
enumDescriptions.Foreign: The drive is currently encrypted, the data is not accessible to the user, and the system requires user intervention to expose the data
enumDescriptions.Unencrypted: The drive is not currently encrypted

enumDescriptions.UnconfiguredGood: Good drive that is not configured to any volume.
enumDescriptions.UnconfiguredBad: The drive is Unconfigured bad drive.
enumDescriptions.HotSpareDrive: The drive is Hot spare disk.
enumDescriptions.JBOD: The drive is controlled by the host, not by the RAID controller card.
enumDescriptions.UnConfiguredShielded: The drive is UnConfigured and shielded.
enumDescriptions.HotSpareShielded: The drive is Hot Spare and shielded.
enumDescriptions.ConfiguredShielded: The drive is Configured and shielded.
enumDescriptions.Active: The drive is in Active state.
enumDescriptions.Standby: The drive is in Standby state.
enumDescriptions.Sleep: The drive is in Sleep state.
enumDescriptions.DSTInProgress: The DST is being performed in background.
enumDescriptions.SMARTOfflineDataCollection: SMART offline data collection is being performed in background.
enumDescriptions.SCTCommand: SCT command is being executed in background.

enumDescriptions.None: The drive is not currently a hotspare
enumDescriptions.Global: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for all other drives in the storage system
enumDescriptions.Chassis: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for all other drives in the chassis
enumDescriptions.Dedicated: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for a user defined set of drives. If a PMC RAID card is used, the drive can also be used as a hotspare for all drive groups.
enumDescriptions.Auto Replace: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for a user defined set of drives

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Type.longDescription: Identifies the type of a drive.

DriveID.longDescription: Identifies a drive when a RAID array is created.

AssociatedResource.longDescription: This property specifies the resources associated with the SSDs.

Position.longDescription: This property shall specify the position of drive.

HoursOfPoweredUp.description: Number of hours of powered-up time.
HoursOfPoweredUp.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of hours of powered-up time.

BDF.longDescription: This property indicates the root port BDF (Bus, Device, Function) resource allocated by the BIOS for the Drive.

CryptoEraseSupported.description: Whether the drive support cryptographically erase a self-encrypting drive (SED).
CryptoEraseSupported.longDescription: Whether the drive support cryptographically erase a self-encrypting drive (SED).

RebuildState.description: The status of the Rebuild of this drive
RebuildState.longDescription: This property shall contain the Rebuild status for the associated drive.

RebuildProgressPercent.longDescription: This property shall specify the drive rebuild progress.

PatrolState.description: The status of the Patrol of this drive
PatrolState.longDescription: This property shall contain the Patrol status for the associated drive.

TemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall specify the current temperature of the drive.

FirmwareStatus.longDescription: This property shall specify the current status of the drive.

IsEPD.description: Specifies whether the drive is an enhanced physical drive.
IsEPD.longDescription: This property shall specify whether the drive is an enhanced physical drive.

SpareforLogicalDrives.description: Volume hosting the hot spare drive.
SpareforLogicalDrives.longDescription: Indicates the volume served by the dedicated hot spare drive.

SASAddress.longDescription: This property shall specify the SAS address of the drive.

PowerState.longDescription: This property shall specify the power state of drive.

SATASmartInformation.description: SMART information of the SATA interface.
SATASmartInformation.longDescription: The value of this property shall be SMART information of the SATA interface of a physical disk.

SASSmartInformation.description: SMART information of the SAS interface.
SASSmartInformation.longDescription: The value of this property shall be SMART information of the SAS interface.

SlotNumber.description: Slot number of the physical drive on the backplane.
SlotNumber.longDescription: This property specifies the slot number of the physical drive on the backplane.

EnclosureDeviceId.description: Device ID of the backplane to which the physical drive is connected.
EnclosureDeviceId.longDescription: This property specifies the device ID of the backplane to which the physical drive is connected. This ID is generated by the RAID controller firmware.

FormFactor.description: The form factor of this drive.
FormFactor.longDescription: This property shall contain form factor of the associated drive.

BootEnable.description: Indicates whether the drive is the current boot disk.
BootEnable.longDescription: This property shall specify whether the drive is the current boot disk.

BootPriority.description: Indicates the priority that the drive is the current boot disk.
BootPriority.longDescription: This property should specify the priority of the drive as the current boot disk.

enumDescriptions.HDD: The drive media type is traditional magnetic platters
enumDescriptions.SSD: The drive media type is solid state or flash memory
enumDescriptions.SMR: The drive media type is shingled magnetic recording

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem properties.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

enumDescriptions.DoneOrNotPatrolled: Patrol read is not being performed on the drive, or the patrol read is complete.
enumDescriptions.Patrolling: Patrol read is being performed on the drive.

enumDescriptions.DoneOrNotRebuilt: Data rebuild is not being performed on the drive, or the rebuild is complete.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MediaErrorCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of media errors.

PrefailErrorCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of prefail errors.

OtherErrorCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of other errors.

HealthStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the hard disk running status.

DiskTemperatureCelsius.description: Current temperature of the hard disk.
DiskTemperatureCelsius.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the current temperature of the hard disk.

DiskStripeTemperatureCelsius.description: Current temperature of hard disk stripes.
DiskStripeTemperatureCelsius.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the current temperature of hard disk stripes.

ElementsInGrownDefectList.description: Number of elements in the grown defect list.
ElementsInGrownDefectList.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of elements in the grown defect list.

ElementsInPrimaryDefectList.description: Number of elements in primary defect list.
ElementsInPrimaryDefectList.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of elements in primary defect list.

WeekAndYearOfManufacture.description: Week and year of the manufacture.
WeekAndYearOfManufacture.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the week and year of the manufacture.

BlocksSentToInitiator.description: Number of blocks sent to the initiator.
BlocksSentToInitiator.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of blocks sent to the initiator.

BlocksReceivedFromInitiator.description: Number of blocks received from the initiator.
BlocksReceivedFromInitiator.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of blocks received from the initiator.

NumberOfMinutesUntilNextSMARTTest.description: Number of minutes until the next internal SMART test.
NumberOfMinutesUntilNextSMARTTest.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of minutes until the next internal SMART test.

SequenceNumberOfLastPredFailEvent.description: The sequence number of last predictive failure event.
SequenceNumberOfLastPredFailEvent.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of minutes until the next internal SMART test.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AttributeRevision.description: Version number of SMART attributes of the SATA interface.
AttributeRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall be SMART attributes of the SATA interface.

AttributeRevisionNumber.description: Number of SMART attributes of the SATA interface.
AttributeRevisionNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of SMART attributes of the SATA interface.

AttributeItemList.description: Number of elements in the grown defect list.
AttributeItemList.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of elements in the grown defect list.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

@odata.id.description: Uniquely identifies the resource within the collection of like resources.
@odata.id.longDescription: This property represents an identifier for the resource.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

SpareforLogicalDrives.description: Volume hosting the hot spare drive.
SpareforLogicalDrives.longDescription: This property shall specify the volume, for which the drive serves as the host spare.

enumDescriptions.PredictiveFailureAnalysis: The drive is still working but predicted to fail soon.
enumDescriptions.Hotspare: The drive is marked to be automatically rebuilt and used as a replacement for a failed drive.
enumDescriptions.InACriticalArray: The array that this drive is a part of is degraded.
enumDescriptions.InAFailedArray: The array that this drive is a part of is failed.

FreeBlocksSpaceMiB.description: Capacity of a free block of the volume.
FreeBlocksSpaceMiB.longDescription: Capacity of a free block of the volume.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

StatusIndicator.description: The state of the status indicator, used to communicate status information about this drive.
StatusIndicator.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the status indicator state for the status indicator associated with this drive. The valid values for this property are specified through the Redfish.AllowableValues annotation.

IndicatorLED.description: The state of the indicator LED, used to identify the drive.
IndicatorLED.longDescription: This value of this property shall contain the indicator light state for the indicator light associated with this drive.

Model.description: This is the model number for the drive.
Model.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the name by which the manufacturer generally refers to the drive.

Revision.longDescription: This property shall contain the revision as defined by the manufacturer for the associated drive.

CapacityBytes.description: The size in bytes of this Drive
CapacityBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the raw size in bytes of the associated drive.

FailurePredicted.description: Is this drive currently predicting a failure in the near future
FailurePredicted.longDescription: This property shall contain failure information as defined by the manufacturer for the associated drive.

Protocol.description: The protocol this drive is using to communicate to the storage controller
Protocol.longDescription: This property shall contain the protocol the associated drive is using to communicate to the storage controller for this system.

MediaType.description: The type of media contained in this drive
MediaType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of media contained in the associated drive.

Manufacturer.description: This is the manufacturer of this drive.
Manufacturer.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the name of the organization responsible for producing the drive. This organization might be the entity from whom the drive is purchased, but this is not necessarily true.

SKU.description: This is the SKU for this drive.
SKU.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the stock-keeping unit number for this drive.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this drive.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a manufacturer-allocated number used to identify the drive.

PartNumber.description: The part number for this drive.
PartNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a part number assigned by the organization that is responsible for producing or manufacturing the drive.

AssetTag.description: The user assigned asset tag for this drive.
AssetTag.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an identifying string used to track the drive for inventory purposes.

Identifiers.description: The Durable names for the drive
Identifiers.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of all known durable names for the associated drive.

Location.longDescription: This property shall contain location information of the associated drive.

HotspareType.description: The type of hotspare this drive is currently serving as,Huawei changes the value of readonly from true to false.
HotspareType.longDescription: This property shall contain the hot spare type for the associated drive. If the drive is currently serving as a hot spare its Status.State field shall be 'StandbySpare' and 'Enabled' when it is being used as part of a Volume.

EncryptionAbility.description: The encryption abilities of this drive
EncryptionAbility.longDescription: This property shall contain the encryption ability for the associated drive.

EncryptionStatus.description: The status of the encrytion of this drive
EncryptionStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain the encrytion status for the associated drive.

RotationSpeedRPM.description: The rotation speed of this Drive in Revolutions per Minute (RPM)
RotationSpeedRPM.longDescription: This property shall contain rotation speed of the associated drive.

BlockSizeBytes.description: The size of the smallest addressible unit (Block) of this drive in bytes
BlockSizeBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain size of the smallest addressible unit of the associated drive.

CapableSpeedGbs.description: The speed which this drive can communicate to a storage controller in ideal conditions in Gigabits per second
CapableSpeedGbs.longDescription: This property shall contain fastest capable bus speed of the associated drive.

NegotiatedSpeedGbs.description: The speed which this drive is currently communicating to the storage controller in Gigabits per second
NegotiatedSpeedGbs.longDescription: This property shall contain current bus speed of the associated drive.

PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.description: The percentage of reads and writes that are predicted to still be available for the media
PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain an indicator of the percentage of life remaining in the Drive's media.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

Volumes.description: An array of references to the volumes contained in this drive. This will reference Volumes that are either wholly or only partly contained by this drive.
Volumes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this drive is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Volume. This shall include all Volume resources of which this Drive is a member and all Volumes for which this Drive is acting as a spare if the HotspareType is Dedicated.

Endpoints.description: An array of references to the endpoints that connect to this drive.
Endpoints.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this drive is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Endpoint.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Operations.description: The operations currently running on the Drive
Operations.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of all operations currently running on the Drive.

Drive.description: Drive contains properties describing a single physical disk drive for any system, along with links to associated Volumes.
Drive.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a disk drive or other physical storage medium for a Redfish implementation.
